name: Tooldo
bulletPoints: Managed API for both admin and general user with JsonWebToken.
Admin role has extra power of adding & deleting products, orders, and role management.
technologies: React, Express, MongoDB, Firebase Authentication, JsonWebToken, Stripe, React Router, React Query, Tailwind, Daisy UI, etc.

name: Speedo
bulletPoints: Consistent in look and feel, interactive, and mobile responsive.
Adding and managing stocks in speedo is snappy.
Find the latest added products in the New Arrival section.
technologies: React, Express, MongoDB, Firebase Authentication, JsonWebToken, React Router, Axios, React Bootstrap, etc.

name: DentAid
brief: Dental service provider website with firebase authentication
bulletPoints: Users are able to book an appointment.
Handled errors related to authentication, authorization, etc.
technologies: React, Express, MongoDB, Firebase Authentication, React Router, React Bootstrap.
